item.title: Real lenses for your mobile cameraphone
item.description: I've seen cases and other lenses that can attach to the phone that add effects like fish eye and wide angle. Â These don't look as easy to use as the case system or even the magnetic system but darn it if they aren't cheap. A Jackson will get you about 4 lenses. I'm going for the fish eye, wide angle, polarized, and star burst lenses.
